header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Food shopping, caring/helping friends and family, eyebrow maintenance, haircuts, arranging meal out, smoking.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, anecdote telling, making arrangement
